message.body: The boys want to go with you to the concert
We need to do the parent plus thingy for Vassar ASAP. Let me know if you need help with it.

I completed the plus loan application for vassar and was denied as expected. Please call vassar financial aid to follow up. Please also talk to Soraya about her behavior with kalev. She is your daughter as well as mine and she needs immediate guidance. If you do not wish to talk to her about it let me know please so I can follow up.
